title: Large & Bright House by Broadway & W 55th Ave for rent
posting_body: Awesome home in great location near stores and expressways for easy commute to Chicago.
On the main level, you'll find a spacious living room with hardwood flooring, formal dining room and kitchen.
Upper level features 2 additional bedrooms and a full bathroom.
Separate entrance to the lower level with a spacious office and additional two rooms
Lower leave can be run as a small business.
Large backyard with deck (Note: car garage.and Separate entrance room is not for lease).
We will check credit $25/person whom is over 18 years old
We will require two recently paycheck stub.
